O2Enrichment.cpp

1 
10 #include "calculator/furnace/O2Enrichment.h"
11 
12 void O2Enrichment::calculate() {
13  excessAir = 8.52381 * o2FlueGas / (2 - 9.52381 * o2FlueGas);
14  excessAirEnriched = 8.52381 * o2FlueGasEnriched / (2 - 9.52381 * o2FlueGasEnriched);
15  heatInput = 95 + (-0.025) * flueGasTemp;
16  heatInputEnriched = 95 + (-0.025) * flueGasTempEnriched;
17  airSpecificHeat = 0.017828518 + 0.000002556 * combAirTemp;
18  enrichedAirSpecificHeat = 0.017828518 + 0.000002556 * combAirTempEnriched;
19  airCorrection = -(-1.07891327 + airSpecificHeat * flueGasTemp) * excessAir;
20  enrichedAirCorrection = -(-1.07891327 + enrichedAirSpecificHeat * flueGasTempEnriched) * excessAirEnriched;
21  combustionAirCorrection = (-1.078913827 + airSpecificHeat * combAirTemp) * (1 + excessAir);
22  combustionAirCorrectionEnriched = (-1.078913827 + enrichedAirSpecificHeat * combAirTempEnriched) * (1 + excessAirEnriched);
23  stdAvailableHeat = heatInput + airCorrection + combustionAirCorrection;
24  stdAvailableHeatEnriched = heatInputEnriched + enrichedAirCorrection + combustionAirCorrectionEnriched;
25  availableHeat = stdAvailableHeat + 100 * (9.38 * (o2CombAir - 0.21) / o2CombAir * 0.02 * ((flueGasTemp - 60) / 980));
26  availableHeatEnriched = stdAvailableHeatEnriched + 100 * (9.38 * (o2CombAirEnriched - 0.21) / o2CombAirEnriched * 0.02 * ((flueGasTempEnriched - 60) / 980));
27  fuelConsumptionEnriched = fuelConsumption * (stdAvailableHeat / availableHeatEnriched);
28  fuelSavingsEnriched = ((fuelConsumption - fuelConsumptionEnriched)/ fuelConsumption) * 100;
29 }
